@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: The simplest case to detect error -- @1.1 By incorrect data Given option 15 in the bug list and press hack ... passed in 0.326s Then enter data ' and submit the form ... passed in 0.277s When the form is submited this No movies were found! must be including into table#table_yellow ... passed in 0.077s
